instruction: Describe an example of a special education teacher in a classroom.
output: Mrs. Smith is a special education teacher in a large urban school. She works with her students to adapt the general classroom curriculum, while they are also learning self-regulation strategies and social skills. She runs a classroom with a positive reinforcement system to encourage her students to stay on-task while carefully differentiating the instruction to meet the needs of the individuals. Mrs. Smith has a firm yet compassionate approach and shows a deep understanding of her students' individual needs.
